title: Mass Executions
description: Political prisoners executed in Evin and Gohardasht prisons following fatwa. JB database: 47 commanders identified, 892 victims documented, 23 mass grave sites confirmed by satellite imagery.

title: Student Uprising
description: Post-election crackdown following university protests. 1,200+ detentions. 5 confirmed deaths. Security force unit records indexed.

title: Green Movement
description: Post-election crackdown. 1,847 detention records indexed. 72 confirmed deaths. Basij and IRGC unit records cross-referenced.

title: Bloody November
description: Largest single crackdown since 1988. 23 commanders identified with identical 'use necessary force' directives traced to 4 cities. Pattern: same wording in 47 SNSC documents recovered. Active cases: 1,201. Ansari case prosecution-ready at 87%.

title: Flight PS752
description: Ukrainian International Airlines. IRGC missile unit commanders identified. 6 command decisions documented. International court proceedings: active.

title: Mahsa Amini Uprising
description: Nationwide uprising following custodial death of Mahsa Amini. Ongoing documentation. 551+ confirmed deaths, 22,000+ detained.

title: Zahedan Bloody Friday
description: IRGC attack on worshippers following Friday prayers in Zahedan. 96 confirmed deaths. Commanders identified through SIGINT and witness testimony.

title: January Revolution
description: Ongoing. Documentation in progress. Transitional authority established. JB platform operational.
